\begin{document}
\centering
\begin{minipage}{13cm}
	\[
		\underbrace{
			P^N_T(i, n)
			=
			\frac{1}{T^n}
			\cdot
			\prod_{j=0}^{i - n - 1}
			\left(1 - \frac{j}{T}\right)
		}_{\text{probability that a random device yields same device ID as device D}}
		\;<\;
		\underbrace{
			p^* = \frac{c}{\binom{N}{2}}
		}_{\text{threshold acceptance probability}}
	\]
\end{minipage}
\end{document}
